name: Let's get Optimized
tagline: Canada's Best SEO Company & Web Design Agency
description:
Let's get optimized prides itself as being a high-performance Canadian based digital agency specializing in SEO, Web Design, Digital ads with locations in Toronto, Oshawa, Montreal & Halifax
 
We truly love what we do and it shows! Our focus is being able to give our clients a full stack solution where every part of the strategy has been perfected. Once our client’s projects go live we want to assure that their KPI's were properly set and through a full attribution they are retrieving a positive ROI per marketing initiative.
We have been labeled by many of our clients as the profit driven marketers due to vigorousness to stop at no cost to be able to implement attribution across a multi channel advertising strategy. Measuring is everything!
Our leader is Canada's first and only Google AdWords Top Contributor and Google Small Business Advisor which allows us to have a very close relationship with Googlers and their product teams.
 Our websites excel in all criteria standards as Google page speed tests and are equipped with all proper W3C validation from markup to AMP.
Rest assure we are you one stop shop for digital performance!
